statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, AVG(score) as average_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name
SELECT player_name, MAX(score) as highest_score FROM leaderboard
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY score DESC, player_name ASC
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1 GROUP BY game_id HAVING AVG(score) > 50
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score >= 200 ORDER BY game_id ASC, player_name DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score BETWEEN 150 AND 300 ORDER BY score DESC, player_id ASC
SELECT * FROM player_scores
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100
SELECT game_id, player_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE game_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_ranks
SELECT player_id, game_id, rank FROM player_ranks WHERE rank <= 3 ORDER BY rank ASC
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE game_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT * FROM player_ranks WHERE game_id = 2 ORDER BY rank ASC
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY game_id, score DESC
SELECT player_id, game_id, rank FROM player_ranks WHERE rank BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY player_id, rank
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE game_id = 1 AND score < 50 ORDER BY game_id, score ASC
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM game_info WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, ranking_position FROM player_rankings WHERE ranking_position <= 3 ORDER BY ranking_position
SELECT player_scores.player_id, player_scores.score, game_info.game_name FROM player_scores INNER JOIN game_info ON player_scores.game_id = game_info.game_id
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT player_scores.player_id, game_name, score FROM player_scores JOIN game_info ON player_scores.game_id = game_info.game_id WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_scores.player_id, ranking_position FROM player_scores JOIN player_rankings ON player_scores.player_id = player_rankings.player_id ORDER BY ranking_position ASC
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_score > 500 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM player JOIN game ON player.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_name, ranking FROM player JOIN player_leaderboard ON player.player_id = player_leaderboard.player_id WHERE leaderboard_id = 1 ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player WHERE game_id = 2 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name FROM player JOIN game ON player.game_id = game.game_id;

SELECT player.player_name, leaderboard.leaderboard_name FROM player JOIN player_leaderboard ON player.player_id = player_leaderboard.player_id JOIN leaderboard ON player_leaderboard.leaderboard_id = leaderboard.leaderboard_id WHERE player.player_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM leaderboard INNER JOIN game ON leaderboard.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM game WHERE genre = 'FPS';
SELECT player_name, email FROM player WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM leaderboard JOIN game ON leaderboard.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player.player_name, ranking.rank FROM player INNER JOIN ranking ON player.player_id = ranking.player_id ORDER BY ranking.rank ASC;
